title: Ritter Sport
text: Nothing but We offer your favourite chocolate with the best ingredients for every taste: whole biscuits, crunchy hazelnuts, sweet strawberries, alpine milk, fine marzipan, or the best Jamaican rum. We could go on like this endlessly... Our path to We have been making cocoa differently for a long time: directly on-site, together with people who are experts in cocoa farming and share the same passion. As a we think from the ground up long-term in generations. Alfred Theodor Ritter - 3rd generation of the Ritter family RITTER SPORT
